# middlesnake

![](man/figures/logo.png)

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of middlesnake is to help crunch data in WRIA 35

## Installation

You can install the development version of middlesnake from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("palouse-anglers/middlesnake")
```
